metadata.title: CVE-2024-5742 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in GNU Nano that allows a possible privilegeescalation through an insecure temporary file. If Nano is killed whileediting, a file it saves to an emergency file with the permissions of therunning user provides a window of opportunity for attackers to escalateprivileges through a malicious symlink.

criterions.comment: nano package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
